ShortDescription.Value: Move/split/add various assets in the asset UI in an orderly manner.

Publish.LongDescription:
# Asset UI Manager Tired of scrolling the asset UI clogged with so many assets? Can't find the specific asset depo you're looking for? Then this is the second best option after Find It.
Asset UI Manager can reposition elements in the ... Asset UI. ## Features * Move the Pathway tabs to the Roads menu instead of Terraforming. * Move all Pedestrian Streets to the Pathway tab. * Move all Bridges to a new tab in the Roads Menu. * Move all Parking Roads to a new tab in the Roads Menu. * Move all Schools to new tabs according to the Education Level. * Move all \"Pocket Parks\" to new tabs in the Parks & Recreation menu. * Move all \"City Parks\" to new tabs in the Parks & Recreation menu. * Add Asset Pack: Transport Depots. * Add Asset Pack: Public Transport. * Add Asset Pack: Cargo Transport. * Add Asset Pack: Transport Lane. (All **options** are __optional__ can be enabled and disabled on the fly. Disabling Asset Packs might require reloading the save.)
## Future Plans * Add props/assets to the menu which are not available in vanilla.
